response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product, while worth significantly more than its face value, offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that could greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its unique features and the value it brings, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a premium price point, tailored to provide exceptional returns on investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
